paragraphs.text:
val df_tweet = spark
    .read
    .json("/kikang/data/twitter/tweets_*/")
    .cache()

select

from
    df_tweet
limit 5

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

import pyspark

# Spark SQL로 JSON 파일 읽은 후 캐시....
df_tweet = spark \
  .read \
  .json("/kikang/data/twitter/tweets_*/") \
  .cache()
#  .persist(pyspark.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY) \

%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import *

rdd = df_tweet.select("createdAt", df_tweet.text, "user.id", col("User.createdAt").alias("user_createdAt")) \
    .rdd \
    .map(lambda row: row.text)
    
rdd.take(5)

%pyspark

from pyspark.ml.feature import HashingTF

text = "스쿨13기화이팅"
n = 3
df = spark.createDataFrame([[[text[i:i+n] for i in range(0, len(text) - (n-1))]]], ["words"])
df.show()

tf = HashingTF(inputCol="words", outputCol="features")

df_features = tf.transform(df)
df_features.show()

paragraphs.title: 학습하기(KMeans)
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.ml.clustering import KMeans

df = spark.read.json("/kikang/data/twitter/tweets_*")
lang_cnt = df.select(df.lang).distinct().count()
print(lang_cnt)
kmeans = KMeans(k=lang_cnt)
kmeans.setSeed()
%pyspark
